text: @SethAbramson Also, Oklahoma is heavily Native American (in fact Tulsa has been built on land supposedly still owned by the Native American tribes), who are also at higher risk of Covid-19 infections & have yet to receive the federal help promised to them to deal with this pandemic!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
